user_query: I need to notify my company's employees about an emergency evacuation drill. Please send an SMS to all employees with the message 'Emergency Alert: Evacuation drill today at 2:00 PM. Follow the designated procedures.' using our Wavecell SMS account. Also, retrieve the delivery status of the SMS with the unique message ID 987654321.

TaskList.description: Send an SMS to all employees regarding the emergency evacuation drill.
Retrieve the delivery status of the SMS using the unique message ID.
TaskList.dependency: Step 1 must be completed to obtain the message ID.
